items.sentence: Recently, I seem to be thirsty all the time.

I\'ll probably still be in Boston on Monday.

Tom and I have a couple of classes together.
Tom and I played together when we were kids.
Tom and I used to often have lunch together.
Tom and Mary are both working in the garden.
Tom majored in literature at the university.
Tom met Mary while he was staying in Boston.
Have you ever tasted anything Tom\'s cooked?
It\'s strange that Tom didn\'t mention that.
Spending time with your family is important.
Ask the driver to stop at the next bus stop.
It wasn\'t as hard as I thought it would be.
It\'ll be dark by the time we get to Boston.
Tom carries Mary\'s books for her every day.
I wish you\'d given me a little more notice.

Tell Tom to get back here as soon as he can.
